name: Find the Egg
description:
Find the Egg!

Use the arrow keys to move around

Run around the maze in this silly small little adventure runner and collect the eggs before the other players do.

This was a submission for the "Low Effort Jam 10" so I did not do as much as I would have liked to.

If you enjoyed this, hit the like or follow button and we will take it further...

Web build will come soon.

** Please, if you experience any problems, leave a comment **
